name: 3D AI Studio
description: 3D AI Studio is an AI-powered platform for generating high-quality 3D models from text or images in seconds.
longDescription: 3D AI Studio is an innovative AI-driven platform designed to simplify 3D content creation by transforming text prompts or image inputs into high-quality 3D models. It caters to creators, designers, and developers in industries like gaming, animation, and product design, offering tools to streamline workflows. The platformâ€™s mission is to make 3D modeling accessible to users with varying expertise, eliminating the need for complex software or extensive manual work. With a user-friendly interface and community-driven features, it fosters creativity and collaboration. The service supports multiple file formats and provides weekly updates to enhance model quality and user experience. Trusted by over 400,000 creators, 3D AI Studio delivers efficient, secure, and scalable 3D asset creation solutions.
features: Text-to-3D generation converts descriptive text prompts into detailed 3D models in seconds, enabling rapid prototyping.
Image-to-3D conversion transforms 2D images into 3D models, simplifying the creation process for visual references.
AI texturing automatically applies realistic PBR textures to models, enhancing visual quality for professional use.
Batch 3D generation allows users to process up to 12 images simultaneously, boosting efficiency for large projects.
Remeshing optimizes model geometry for better quality, suitable for 3D printing and animation applications.
Community Creations gallery showcases user-generated models, fostering inspiration and collaboration among creators.
Dashboard organizes projects, models, and images in a streamlined workspace for easy management.
Blender Bridge integrates with Blender for seamless model editing and cleanup within the platform.
Multiple file format support (OBJ, FBX, USDZ, GLB, STL, BLEND) ensures compatibility with industry-standard tools.
Light and Dark Mode options allow users to customize the interface for their preferred working environment.

faqs.question: What is 3D AI Studio?
faqs.answer: 3D AI Studio is an AI-powered platform that generates high-quality 3D models from text or images, designed for creators in gaming, animation, and design.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, 3D AI Studio offers a free plan with limited usage, allowing users to test core features before subscribing.

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate a 3D model?
faqs.answer: Generating a 3D model typically takes 15-25 seconds, depending on the complexity and server load.

faqs.question: Can I use my own images to create 3D models?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upload images directly to the platform and convert them into 3D models using the Image-to-3D tool.

faqs.question: What file formats are supported for export?
faqs.answer: The platform supports exporting models in OBJ, FBX, USDZ, GLB, STL, and BLEND formats for seamless integration with other software.

faqs.question: How can I get support if I encounter issues?
faqs.answer: Contact the support team at support@3daistudio.com or join the Discord community for real-time assistance and feedback.

faqs.question: Does 3D AI Studio offer animation capabilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, the platform supports animation generation, allowing users to create engaging animations for their 3D models.

faqs.question: Can I share my models with the community?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can share high-quality models in the Community Creations gallery and earn 20 free credits per contribution.
